types.html:
se prendre au jeu

  1. to get caught up in the game, to take a liking to the game, to get into it, to play along, to get into the swing of things (to start liking to do something)
    Synonym: se piquer au jeu
    se laisser prendre au jeu ― (please add an English translation of this usage example)
trans: to get caught up in the game, to take a liking to the game, to get into it, to play along, to get into the swing of things

title: se prendre au jeu
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /sə pʁɑ̃dʁ o ʒø/
